channel.title: Help please whould be nice kinda easy
channel.description: so everyone uses only 1 wepon on my server cuz its so strong can anyone please tell me the code so i can lower the bonus for the wepon please and thanks in advance :) -aber

item.title: Help please whould be nice kinda easy
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

Go to your items.cfg

Press Ctrl+F and search the item code or item.

item = 1135	Dragonhide_body	Made_from_100%_real_dragonhide.	5349.88142885705	5349.88142885705	6615.51449394361	0	0	0	-15	15	40	32	45	20	40	0	0

Edit the

	0	0	0	-15	15	40	32	45	20	40	0	0

part =D, It goes in order like it would in game.

Read full topic
item.source: Help please whould be nice kinda easy
